hover_text.autosort_button_mouse_compact:
Autosort inventory.
Hold [Right-click] for more options.
hover_text.autosort_button_mouse:
Autosort inventory.
Hold [Right-click] for
more options.
hover_text.gold_controller: Press a button to drop gold:
hover_text.game_timer_pin: pin the game timer to the HUD.
hover_text.game_timer_unpin: unpin the game timer from the HUD.

class.stat_growth_info:
Level Up increases three Stats by +1, influenced by Class
Improving skills provides +20% to roll +2 for an Associated Stat   (See Associated Stats in Skills List)

stats.stat_str_desc:
Increases melee ATK damage
Improves movement speed while carrying large weights
stats.stat_dex_desc:
Increases ranged and thrown ATK damage
Improves movement speed while carrying small weights
stats.stat_con_desc:
Increases Armor Class (AC)
Reduces duration of negative status effects
Improves effects of Potions of Healing
stats.stat_int_desc:
Increases Spell Power (PWR) and MP regen (RGN)
Increases effects of Magic and Casting skills
Improves effects of Potions of Restore Magic
stats.stat_per_desc:
Increases Armor Pierce chance with Ranged weaponry
Increases effects of Tinkering and Appraisal skills
Provides extra visibility in dark areas
stats.stat_chr_desc:
Provides better prices when trading with Shopkeepers
Increases effects of Leadership and Trading skills

attributes_atk.attributes_atk_melee_desc:
Critical strikes deal 200%% damage
Higher %s skill increases ATK average
Striking enemies from behind deals additional damage based on Stealth skill
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_pickaxe_desc:
Critical strikes deal 200%% damage
Striking enemies from behind deals additional damage based on Stealth skill
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_unarmed_desc:
Critical strikes deal 200%% damage
Higher %s skill increases ATK average
Equipped rings and fist weapons modify ATK
Striking enemies from behind deals additional damage based on Stealth skill
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_ranged_desc:
Ranged attacks have a chance to ignore 50%% of target's AC based on PER stat
Higher %s skill increases ATK average
Equipped quivers modify ATK and apply additional effects on hit
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_thrown_desc:
Attacks ignore 50-75%% of target's AC
Higher %s skill increases damage
Fully charged throw deals maximum damage and increases Armor Pierce on target
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_gem_desc:
Higher %s skill increases damage
Fully charged throws deal maximum damage
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_potion_desc:
Potion effects are also applied to the target on impact
Higher %s skill increases impact and potion effect damage
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_magicstaff_desc:
Casts contained Magicstaff spell on attack
Charging magicstaff allows finer aim when releasing attack
Spell power and effects are unaffected by charge amount
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_tool_desc:
Unable to attack while held
Interacts with objects in the world on use
attributes_atk.attributes_atk_tinker_tool_desc:
Deploys held Tinkering tool on attack
Fully charged throw deploys held item further

attributes_ac.attributes_ac_desc:
Reduces physical damage taken per AC point
Blocking increases AC no matter the direction or timing of incoming attacks
Active Blocking Bonus applies to most Off-hand items, while Passive Skill Bonus applies only to held shields

attributes_pwr.attributes_pwr_desc:
Increases spell damage and healing when casting learned spells
Spellbook-Casting with held spellbooks provides greater spell amplification

attributes_res.attributes_res_desc:
Reduces spell damage taken by resistance % (Negative % increases damage taken)
Multiple sources of Magic Resistance from items/effects stack diminishingly

attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_hp_desc:
HP Regenerates slowly over time, instant HP restoration requires potions or spells
Maximum Regen Modifier from items/effects limited to +3 [HP Regen]
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_hp_desc_no_hunger:
NOTE: Hunger is disabled in Game Settings for the current play session, HP no longer regenerates passively
Instead, restore HP by consuming food and using potions/spells
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_en_desc_no_hunger:
NOTE: Hunger is disabled in Game Settings for the current play session, EN no longer degenerates passively
Casting spells consumes EN
Starvation occurs when EN is empty
Restore EN by consuming food, sweet liquids and using MP restoring effects
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_en_base_bonus:
Base EN Burn Rate:
 (Using any map Hunger modifiers)
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_entry_statskill_bonus:
Stat / Skill Bonus:
 (Using INT stat x Casting skill)
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_mp_desc:
MP regenerates slowly over time, maximum of 1 MP every 2 seconds before Regen Modifiers
Maximum Regen Modifier from items/effects limited to +3 [MP Regen]
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_ht_desc:
NOMINAL boiler increases HT production
SUPERHEATED boiler increases HT production 2x as fast, and 4x if HT below 50% capacity
CRITICALLY LOW boiler rapidly loses HT, unit malfunction may occur at 0 HT
attributes_rgn_hp.attributes_rgn_en_desc:
Energy reduces slowly over time, effects of Slow Digestion increases the longevity of EN
Casting spells consumes EN
Starvation occurs when EN is empty
Restore EN by consuming food, sweet liquids and using MP restoring effects

attributes_wgt.attributes_wgt_movement_speed:
Current Movement speed:
 (Using Weight + STR + DEX stat)
attributes_wgt.attributes_wgt_desc:
Carrying items and gold increases Carried Weight, reducing movement speed
STR stat reduces Weight Penalties
DEX stat provides passive movement speed and increases maximum movement speed

Start Map.description: The outskirts of Hamlet's southwest gate holds the entrance to the Devils' Bastion.

The Mines.description: Citizens of Hamlet dug in vain for gold here.

The Swamp.description: Underground springs feed the strange plants here.

The Labyrinth.description: The sands seem to be from an ancient ocean run dry.

The Ruins.description: In the deepest depths, Herx's slaves built a city.

Mines to Swamp Transition.description: A place built for those who are passing through.

Swamp to Labyrinth Transition.description: The bridges allow access across the great chasm.

Labyrinth to Ruins Transition.description: It looks like the bridges used to be withdrawn.

Boss.description: This place looks like it wasn't built by humans.

Hell Boss.description: You feel a magic connection to Herx's Lair here.

Hell.description: This place beckons the hatred within you.

Mages Guild.description: The buildings around the entrance to the minehead look to have serviced adventurers moving through here.

Caves To Citadel Transition.description: The machinery here appears to be drawing upon the crystals.

Caves.description: The air throbs with magic from the materials in the walls here.

Citadel.description: This mechanical campus feels cut off from the outside world.

Sanctum.description: The laws of reality appear to be breaking at the center of this massive machine.
